Summary Note:
Saar Tess Visser and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Amsterdam. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Having worked for over 27 years, Saar Tess Visser brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
She was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Saar Tess Visser is currently widowed. She has 1 kid called Astrid.
Education Background:
Saar earned her secondary school diploma from Scholengroep Carmel Maastricht in 1991.
Saar pursued higher education at Amsterdam Business School, graduating in 1996.
Occupation History:
Saar Tess Visser is a 51 year old Fund Manager from Netherlands. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Saar Tess Visser began her professional journey as a Analyst at NIBC Private Equity B.V. in 1998, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Associate at NIBC Private Equity B.V. in 2003, further expanding her skill set.
She spent 5 years working as a Investment Director at NIBC Private Equity B.V., refining her expertise and building a strong network.
After 14 years of dedication, she assumed the role of Partner at Alpinvest Partners B.V. in 2014, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Since joining Gilde Buy Out Partners B.V. as a Fund Manager in 2018, she has established herself as a respected authority, fostering collaboration and pushing boundaries to achieve groundbreaking results.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 610000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She has condo located in The Hague, worth 1430000 EUR.

She inherited a significant sum of 3300000 EUR from her grandmother, a respected Real Estate Developer, in 2007, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
